title: A History of Stoutwear, an interview with Dr. Lauren Downing Peters
itunes:title: A History of Stoutwear, an interview with Dr. Lauren Downing Peters
description:
Dubbed "stoutwear" at the turn of the 20th century, Dr. Lauren Downing Peters joins us this week to discuss the history of plus-size fashion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
